description.value: As long as both Character and their Comrade are in the same Multi-Passenger Vehicle, the Vehicles Operator (Who can be the Character) can make a -20 Operate Test in response to incoming fire as a Free Action. If successful the incoming fire can strike any side of the vehicle of the Character's Choice instead of the armour that was facing the incoming fire. (EG: Chance Incoming fire that would hit the low-armoured rear to hit the high-armoured front)
